name: Project Untitled
description:
Warning: The game may not work on ALL browsers. I can confirm it works perfectly on Chrome and Firefox and malfunctions on Brave.
<> FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED <>
(@) Project Untitled, a 2D platformer run & gun which i'm working on. (@)

---====]==(@) Controls (@)==[====---
Menu:
Press any key to continue

Floor 1:
Move - Arrow keys / WSAD
Aim & shoot - Mouse, shoot with LMB
Sprint - L. Shift
Back to menu - ESC

The current version (above) is a development build. Everything is a subject to change.
